casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Beach SMITH. No. 346A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC. Joseph Blount Cheshire, V, Raleigh, for William Beach Smith.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2005 by Defendant for Partial Remand to Court of Appeals:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
